rules: Rule1: If the research facility receives government grant funding, then the research achieves a breakthrough
Rule2: If the organization submits a clinical trial application, then the organization completes pre-clinical testing
Rule3: If the organization completes pre-clinical testing, then the clinical trial receives regulatory body approval
Rule4: If the organization develops an alternative compound, then researchers identify side effects
Rule5: If researchers identify side effects, then researchers observe adverse reactions
Rule6: If researchers identify side effects, then researchers do not modify the drug formulation
Rule7: If researchers observe adverse reactions, then researchers modify the drug formulation
Rule8: The platform achieves commercial success or the research achieves a breakthrough
Rule9: If the platform faces market competition, then the platform does not achieve commercial success
Rule10: If the research facility receives corporate grant funding, then the research achieves a breakthrough
Rule11: If the company invests in a marketing campaign, then the platform faces market competition
Rule12: The company implements a price reduction or the company launches a promotional offer
Rule13: If the company launches a promotional offer, then under the condition that the company does not invest in a marketing campaign, the platform gains market share
Rule14: If the company analyzes market data, then should the company implement a price reduction, given that the company does not invest in a marketing campaign, the platform gains market share
Rule15: The company analyzes market data or the company conducts a consumer survey
Rule16: If the company conducts a consumer survey, then whenever the company implements a price reduction and the company does not invest in a marketing campaign, the platform gains market share
Rule17: If the material contains alcohol, then the material requires special storage
Rule18: The material contains alcohol or the research achieves a breakthrough
Rule19: The material degrades at room temperature or the material does not require special storage
Rule20: If the research facility conducts research on plant extracts, then the research facility receives government grant funding
Rule21: If the research facility conducts research on synthetic compounds, then the research facility receives corporate grant funding
Rule22: If the research facility synthesizes plant extracts into drug compounds, then research on plant extracts does not progress

Rule23: The research facility synthesizes plant extracts into drug compounds or the research facility conducts research on plant extracts or the research facility conducts research on synthetic compounds
Rule24: If the organization publishes a research paper, then the research achieves a breakthrough
Rule25: The organization publishes a research paper or the organization presents conference findings
Rule26: If neither the platform receives regulatory approval nor the research achieves a breakthrough, then the organization develops an alternative compound
Rule27: If it is not the case that filing a patent extension by the organization leads to extended patent protection, then the patent is challenged by generic manufacturers
Rule28: If it is not the case that filing a patent extension by the organization leads to extended patent protection, then the patent is not challenged by generic manufacturers

Rule29: If synthesizing plant extracts into drug compounds by the research facility does not result in progress of research on plant extracts, then a manufacturing process for plant extracts is designed

Rule30: If synthesizing plant extracts into drug compounds by the research facility does not result in progress of research on plant extracts, then a manufacturing process for plant extracts is not designed
Rule31: If presenting conference findings by the organization does not lead to research breakthrough, then the organization submits a clinical trial application

Rule32: If the failure of presenting conference findings to lead to research breakthrough does not result in clinical trial approval by the regulatory body, then the organization files a patent extension

Rule33: If the failure of presenting conference findings to lead to research breakthrough does not result in clinical trial approval by the regulatory body, then the organization does not extend patent protection
facts: Fact1: The clinical trial does not receive regulatory body approval
Fact2: The platform does not receive regulatory approval
Fact3: The platform does not gain market share
Fact4: The material does not degrade at room temperature
